column1: '''Carnimírië''' was one of the [[rowans]] of [[Fangorn Forest]]
column2: much beloved by the [[Ent]] [[Quickbeam|Bregalad]]. It was cut down by [[Orcs]] of [[Isengard]]
column3: arousing the anger of this impulsive Ent.<ref>{{TT|III4}}</ref>

column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] explained that ''carnemírie'' means "with adornment of red jewels" in High-elven ([[Quenya]]).<ref>{{L|168}}</ref>  See also ''caran'' in the Appendix to ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.<ref>{{S|Appendix}}</ref>
